EmailTemplate.subject: Get to know the people you work with!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
View Online <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/dcr/sites/core/Gtblog-what-employees-desks-say-about-them.aspx?cmp=EBBSAUGUSTBLOG19EN&utm_source={{my.UTM%20Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Do you really know your employees?
What people keep on their desks say more about them than you think. Discover what your employees’ desks tell you about them.
